item.title: KKR 季度利润飙升，手续费收入创历史新高
item.description: 另类基金管理公司 KKR & Co 公布的 2024 年第三季度调整后净收入猛增 58%，主要得益于创纪录的费用相关收入以及保险业务收益。【原文：Alternative fund manager KKR & Co reported a 58% jump in adjusted net income for the third quarter of 2024, driven by record fee-related income, as well as earnings from its insurance business.】

item.title: 全球国防开支攀升，诺斯罗普-格鲁曼再次上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 由于中东冲突和旷日持久的俄乌战争导致全球国防开支增加，美国国防公司诺斯罗普-格鲁曼（Northrop Grumman）周四第二次上调了2024年的利润预期。【原文：U.S. defense company Northrop Grumman on Thursday raised its 2024 profit forecast for the second time, amid increased global defense spending prompted by conflicts in the Middle East and the protracted Russia-Ukraine war.】

item.title: 西南航空公布第三季度业绩，因定价改善而意外盈利
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周四公布，受益于价格和需求的改善，以及因七月份全球网络中断而滞留的乘客重新预订机票，该公司第三季度意外盈利。【原文：Southwest Airlines reported a surprise third-quarter profit on Thursday, benefiting from improved pricing and demand, as well as rebookings from passengers stranded due to the global cyber outage in July.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司公布季度利润下降，原因是炼油利润率疲软
item.description: 由于炼油利润率下降，瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy）周四公布的第三季度利润下滑了 86%，但仍超出了华尔街的预期。【原文：Refiner Valero Energy posted a 86% slump in third-quarter profit on Thursday on falling refining margins, but managed to beat Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 玩具需求疲软，孩之宝季度销售额降幅超预期
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro）周四公布的第三季度销售额降幅超过预期，原因是消费者收紧了玩具消费，但该公司严格的成本控制提高了利润率。【原文：Hasbro on Thursday posted a steeper-than-expected drop in sales for the third quarter as consumers tightened spending on toys, but the company's stringent cost controls boosted margins.】

item.title: 瑞士银行家对更严格的资本规则计划表示担忧
item.description: 瑞士银行家协会周四批评了政府在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）于 2023 年倒闭后对瑞银提出更严格资本要求的计划，称这些措施可能会损害瑞士金融业的竞争力。【原文：The Swiss Bankers Association on Thursday criticised government plans for tougher capital requirements on UBS following the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse, saying the measures could hurt the competitiveness of the country's financial sector.】

item.title: 企业支出放缓施压咨询业增长，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: IBM 股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌了约 5%，原因是企业在非 GenAI 项目上的支出减少，给其咨询部门带来压力，从而削弱了软件部门的实力。【原文：IBM shares fell about 5% in premarket trading on Thursday, as reduced enterprise spending on non-GenAI projects pressured its consulting segment, clouding software unit strength.】

item.title: 陶氏开始审查部分欧洲资产，第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 陶氏化学公司周四表示，尽管由于美国和加拿大对包装用聚乙烯等工业产品的需求增加，该公司第三季度利润超出预期，但该公司已开始对其部分欧洲资产进行审查。【原文：Chemical company Dow said on Thursday it has begun a review of some of its European assets even as its third-quarter profit beat estimates on higher demand in the U.S. and Canada for industrial items such as polyethylene used in packaging.】

item.title: 欧盟隐私监管机构对 LinkedIn 罚款 3.1 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟主要隐私监管机构周四表示，已对微软旗下职业网络平台 LinkedIn 的定向广告行为处以 3.1 亿欧元（3.35 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：The lead European Union privacy regulator on Thursday said it had imposed a 310 million euro ($335 million) fine on Microsoft's professional networking platform LinkedIn over its targeted advertising practices.】

item.title: UPS 公布第三季度利润增长，原因是销量反弹和成本削减
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周四公布第三季度利润增长，原因是节假日旺季来临前的货运量反弹提高了收入，而成本削减帮助抵消了消费者转向更便宜的快递选择对利润率的冲击。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as rebounding volumes ahead of the holiday season lifted revenues, while cost cuts helped offset the margin hit from consumers shifting to cheaper delivery options.】

item.title: 数据显示，减肥药并未在两年内降低医疗成本
item.description: 路透社获得的一份美国医疗保险理赔分析报告显示，Wegovy 等药物可能会减少你的腰围，但不会减少医疗费用。【原文：Drugs like Wegovy may trim your waistline but not medical costs, according to an analysis of U.S. health insurance claims shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 美国法官如何将文化战争注入波音 737 MAX 的认罪协议中
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一名联邦法官在裁决中一贯支持保守派，他抓住协议中有关美国司法部多元化政策的一句话，为波音公司就两起致命的 737 MAX 飞机坠毁事件达成的认罪协议注入了不确定性。【原文：A Texas federal judge with a record of ruling in favor of conservative causes injected uncertainty into Boeing's agreement to plead guilty over two fatal 737 MAX plane crashes, seizing upon a single sentence in the deal about the U.S. Department of Justice's diversity policy.】

item.title: 降息将加速美国银行转向高收益投资
item.description: 降息和债券收益率的放宽正在刺激一些美国银行减少低收益投资证券的损失，并将这些资金存入高收益票据，以提高收益和流动性。【原文：Rate cuts and easing bond yields are spurring some U.S. banks to cut losses on low-yielding investment securities, and park those funds in higher-yielding paper to improve returns and liquidity.】

item.title: 特斯拉大涨，市场反弹，收益率回落
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 特斯拉大涨 11%，期货在大跌后反弹
item.description: 周四，由于特斯拉公司的乐观预测拉开了大型股公司财报的序幕，跟踪标普 500 指数和纳斯达克 100 指数的期货价格上涨，而此前一个交易日主要股指均下跌。【原文：Futures tracking the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq 100 rose on Thursday as an upbeat forecast from Tesla kicked off megacap earnings on a positive note, following declines in major indexes in the previous session.】

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper 以 9.9 亿美元收购能量饮料制造商 Ghost 的多数股权
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper 和 Ghost 两家公司周四表示，Keurig Dr Pepper 将以 9.9 亿美元的价格收购能量饮料制造商 Ghost 60% 的股份，并计划在 2028 年收购其余股份。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper is buying a 60% stake in energy-drink maker Ghost for $990 million, with a plan to purchase the rest in 2028, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞银报告称富裕客户对艺术品更加谨慎，去年艺术品销售额下降
item.description: 瑞士银行瑞银周四发布的《艺术市场报告》显示，由于最富有的买家减少购买，去年全球艺术品销售额下降了4%，约为650亿美元。【原文：Global art sales fell 4% last year to around $65 billion, as the wealthiest buyers reduced purchases, according to the Art Market Report, published by Swiss bank UBS on Thursday.】

item.title: 马什称全球商业保险费率出现七年来首次季度下降
item.description: 经纪商和风险顾问公司 Marsh 周四发布的全球保险市场指数显示，2024 年第三季度全球商业保险费率下降了 1%，这是七年来首次出现季度下降。【原文：Global commercial insurance rates fell 1% in the third quarter of 2024, the first quarterly decline recorded in seven years, the Global Insurance Market Index by broker and risk advisor Marsh on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 工人拒绝最新劳资协议后波音股价下跌 2.7
item.description: 周四，波音公司股价在美股盘前交易中下跌 2.7%，此前约 33,000 名罢工工人投票拒绝了新的劳资协议，从而加深了这家美国飞机制造商的危机。【原文：Boeing shares fell 2.7% in U.S. premarket trading on Thursday after about 33,000 striking workers voted to reject a new labor offer, deepening the crisis at the U.S. planemaker a day after it reported a $6 billion loss.】

item.title: 西班牙制药商罗维将保留第三方生产业务
item.description: 西班牙制药商罗维公司（Rovi）周四表示，在审查了几份无约束力的报价后，将不会出售其第三方合同开发与生产业务（CDMO）。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Rovi will not sell its third-party contract development and manufacturing business (CDMO) after reviewing several non-binding offers, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 联合利华在抵制声中对印尼市场进行 "大刀阔斧 "的改革
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）财务总监周四表示，联合利华将在印度尼西亚进行 "大刀阔斧 "的改革，因为消费者抵制跨国品牌是对加沙战争的回应，这将加剧联合利华现有的分销问题。【原文：Unilever will make "drastic" changes in Indonesia, its finance chief said on Thursday as consumers boycott multinational brands in response to the war in Gaza and exacerbate the business' existing distribution problems.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特上调全年展望，因需求强于预期
item.description: 德国国际航运公司赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）周四表示，将上调全年盈利指导，理由是需求强于预期，且运费有所改善。【原文：German international shipping company Hapag-Lloyd said on Thursday that it is raising its full-year earnings guidance, citing stronger-than-expected demand and improved freight rates.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，预算案公布前英国商业增长创 11 个月新低
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于工党政府首份预算案出台前的不确定性打击了人们的信心，10月份英国企业报告的增长速度为11个月来最慢，招聘人数也出现了今年以来的首次萎缩。【原文：British businesses reported their slowest growth in 11 months in October and hiring shrank for the first time this year as uncertainty ahead of the Labour government's first budget dampened confidence, a survey showed.】

item.title: 特斯拉发布重要电动汽车增长预测，消除投资者担忧，股价大涨
item.description: 特斯拉公司周四盘前交易中股价大涨近 12%，此前一天，该公司预测汽车销量将大幅增长，并向投资者保证首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）仍在寻求扩大该公司销售电动汽车的核心业务。【原文：Tesla stock shot up nearly 12% in pre-market trade on Thursday, a day after it forecast surging car sales growth, reassuring investors that CEO Elon Musk was still looking to expand the company's core business of selling electric vehicles.】

item.title: PMI显示欧元区商业活动陷入困境
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，欧元区本月的商业活动再次停滞不前，仍处于收缩区间，原因是尽管企业勉强提高了价格，但国内外需求均有所下降。【原文：Euro zone business activity stalled again this month, remaining in contractionary territory as demand from both home and abroad fell despite firms barely increasing their prices, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道欧洲航天局称正与 SpaceX 就解决太空垃圾问题进行谈判
item.description: 欧洲航天局局长约瑟夫-阿施巴赫告诉路透社记者，该局正在与 SpaceX 公司就埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空企业加入一项旨在减少日益增多的太空碎片群的国际宪章的可能性进行谈判。【原文：The European Space Agency is in talks with SpaceX about the possibility of Elon Musk's space venture joining an international charter designed to reduce a growing swarm of debris in space, Director General Josef Aschbacher told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本央行称，日本银行应对市场尾部风险保持警惕
item.description: 日本央行周四表示，日本的银行拥有充足的资本基础，但需要对包括全球金融市场发展和地缘政治危险在内的尾部风险保持警惕。【原文：Japanese banks have sufficient capital bases but need to be vigilant against tail risks including developments in global financial markets and geopolitical perils, the Bank of Japan said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 推出用于增程型混合动力汽车的新型电池
item.description: 中国电池巨头 CATL 周四推出了首款专注于增程型混合动力汽车的电池产品，而这一电动汽车类别的销量在所有细分市场中增长最快。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL on Thursday launched its first battery product focused on extended-range hybrids at a time when this category of electrified cars is seeing the fastest growth in sales among all segments.】

item.title: 欧洲最高法院在长期反垄断案中裁定英特尔胜诉
item.description: 欧洲最高法院--欧盟法院裁定英特尔胜诉，结束了这家美国芯片制造商与欧盟监管机构之间长达近二十年的争斗。【原文：EU Court of Justice, Europe's top court, ruled in favour of Intel, ending a nearly two decade-long fight between the U.S. chipmaker and EU regulators who had said it had tried to thwart a rival.】

item.title: 尽管对 2024 年营业利润发出警告，Kering 股价仍然上涨
item.description: 开云集团（Kering）周四股价上涨，尽管该法国奢侈品公司周三表示，由于中国需求疲软，其2024年营业收入将减少近一半，达到多年来的最低点。【原文：Shares in Kering were in positive territory Thursday despite the French luxury goods saying on Wednesday its 2024 operating income would almost halve to its lowest in years due to weak demand in China.】
